login.top description: Twitch streamer vs. viewers on Gomoku!
login.description1: The coordinates with the most votes become the number of viewers

setting.title: Settings
setting.description1: 1. enter the desired coordinates in chat.
setting.description1-1: For example.) Coordinate formats that can specify a location: A1, a10, A10, 8B, 14g, etc.
setting.description2: 2. The coordinates with the most votes will be the number of viewers.
setting.description3: 3. If you don't vote in time, you lose.
setting.description4: 4. You can only vote once per turn.
setting.description5: 5. The rules apply the Renju rule.

gomoku.alert title: Want to go back to settings?
